title: Explosions in the Sky - Live Recordings and Peel Sessions Plus M
description:
Compilation of EITS live material, peel sessions plus studio recordings and the track The Long Spring from Thank You (TRR50) (2004).


-Live at KVRX 4 Jul 1999

1. Glittering Blackness
2. Unknown
3. Unknown
4. Unknown
5. Unknown
6. Magic Hours
8. Glittering Blackness

Note: Missing track 7 Remember Me as a Time of Day from Refurbished Robots (1999).


-Live at KVRX 24 Oct 2000

1. The Moon Is Down
2. Yasmin The Light
3. Once More To The Afterlife
4. With Tired Eyes Tired Minds Tired Souls We Slept


-Syracuse Studio Recordings (xx.06.02)

1. Russian Sailors (Memorial)
2. Afterlife (The Long Spring)
3. Russian Sailors (Memorial variant 1)
4. Afterlife (The Long Spring)
5. Russian Sailors (Memorial variant 2)


-Peel Sessions-2002.09.18

1. First Breath After Coma
2. The Moon Is Down
3. Memorial


-Peel Session 28.01.04

1. The Only Moment We Were Alone
2. The Long Spring
3. With Tired eyes, Tired Minds, Tired Souls, We Slept


-Thank You (TRR50)

1. The Long Spring
